title: Revocation or suspension of licenses to solemnize
context: [ยง572-13.5] Revocation or suspension of licenses to solemnize. Any license to solemnize marriages issued pursuant to section 572-12 may be revoked or suspended by the department of health, if the holder of the license has failed to comply with the applicable provisions of this chapter or of the rules of the department of health. [L 1981, c 202, ยง3]
